name: Titanium Dioxide Industry Consortium
goal: The Titanium Dioxide Industry Consortium (TDIC) manages the REACH registration of titanium dioxide and related manufacturing process intermediates and will liaise with registrants of key raw materials in other consortia and SIEFs.
interests: Business and Industry, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health
euInitiatives: The REACH regulations, CLP and the definition and regulation of nanomaterials
